quotes.quote: A work ill done must be twice done.
Be slow in choosing a friend, slower still in changing.
Don't give up the ship.
God gave us the nuts but he doesn't crack them.
If you fail to practice your art, it will soon disappear.
In bad luck, hold out; in good luck, hold in.
Keep your head about you.
Leave no stone unturned.
Little by little does the trick.
Little by little one walks far.
Never say die.
Never say never.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up.
Persevere no matter what.
Slow and steady wins the race.
Stick to your guns.
What you have, hold.
You don't know what you've got until it's gone.
You never fail until you stop trying.
Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th
Perseverance, secret of all triumphs.
Perseverance is a great element of success. If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
By perseverance the snail reached the ark.
Perseverance - a lowly virtue whereby mediocrity achieves an inglorious success.
If you are going through hell, keep going.
I'm a slow walker, but I never walk back.
